mt.comm

Interface ServerComm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnalyticsFilter, ServerCommImpl

    public interface ServerComm

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean clientIsConnected(java.lang.String nickname)
      Checks if a client with a certain nickname is currently connected.
      void disconnectClient(java.lang.String nickname)
      Disconnect a client.
      ServerSideMessage getNextMessage()
      Get the next message received from one of the clients.
      boolean hasNextMessage()
      Checks if a message from a client is pending.
      void sendError(java.lang.String toNickname, java.lang.String error)
      Report an error to a client.
      void sendOrder(java.lang.String receiversNickname, Order order)
      Send an order to a client.
      void start()
      Starts the MicroTrader server.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        Starts the MicroTrader server. The method should setup a server socket and begin to accept connections. This method must return immediately after a server socket has been setup, and another thread should started to listen for connections.

      • getNextMessage

        ServerSideMessage getNextMessage()
        Get the next message received from one of the clients. If no message is has been received, the method blocks until a message is received. If no message will ever be received, null is returned.
        Returns:
        The next message sent by one of the connected clients to the server

      • hasNextMessage

        boolean hasNextMessage()
        Checks if a message from a client is pending. If hasNextMessage() returns true, a call to getNextMessage() will return immediately with the oldest message in the queue. If hasNextMessage() returns false, a call to getNextMessage() will block until a message has been received.
        Returns:
        true if a message from a client is currently pending, otherwise false.

      • sendOrder

        void sendOrder(java.lang.String receiversNickname,
               Order order)
        Send an order to a client.
        Parameters:
        receiversNickname - nickname of the client to receive the order. If no client with the nickname is currently connected, no order is sent.
        order - order to send.

      • sendError

        void sendError(java.lang.String toNickname,
               java.lang.String error)
        Report an error to a client.
        Parameters:
        toNickname - nickname of the client.
        error - description of the error.

      • clientIsConnected

        boolean clientIsConnected(java.lang.String nickname)
        Checks if a client with a certain nickname is currently connected.
        Parameters:
        nickname - nickname of the client to check.
        Returns:
        true if a client with the nickname is currently connected, otherwise false.

      • disconnectClient

        void disconnectClient(java.lang.String nickname)
        Disconnect a client.
        Parameters:
        nickname - nickname of the client to disconnect.
